pullRequest.title: Fix Completion Issues for snippet and pre-declared lang libs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

With this, Add context aware else and else if block suggestions.
Remove the pre declared langlib suggestions with auto import

Fixes #26314
Fixes #26243
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: add context aware else and else if block suggestions
add pre declared lang lib suggestion as modules

nodes.bodyText: Any specific reason to maintain a set of pre-declared lang libs? Can't we just have all lang libs starts with lang.*
